Table	Create Table
items	CREATE TABLE `items` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `itemName` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `category` enum('Motorola','Samsung','Redmi','Realme','Meizu','Honor') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `purchasePrice` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `sellingPrice` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `openingStock` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `defaultUnitPrice` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `notes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `itemCode` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `availableQty` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `idx_items_user_id` (`userId`),
  KEY `idx_items_category` (`category`),
  KEY `` (`userId`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_items_name` (`name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=240001
